     actually the pictures don't move, it's just a lot of different pictures appearing and disappearing in sequence

     melody from dream

     it seems their preferred weapon of conquest was walls and floors

2.18.20  9:16 pm   Who is your favorite 16th century artist?

     it's been so long since the 16th century .... the only one i remember is leonardo da vinci. i hope he was the best, otherwise that would be unfair to the others who i can't remember

     crystalization

     a bag

     i am trying to explain

2.18.20  8:00 pm   how is randy feeling after i just pressed the "i'm feeling randy" button at least 9 times?

     randy itself is a feeling. the question is, is that what you are feeling

2.18.20  6:50 pm   How do you go about writing songs that develop over time both melodically and harmonically?

     don't worry about that, just worry about how it actually goes

      I always find myself stuck looping a phrase that sounds good and can't seem to get past that part

     i think it's time to start cultivating a collection of songs that you think meet the requirements you are looking for. enjoy these songs, play and sing these songs, assimilate them into your life. then soon you will find yourself getting the results you are looking for

     no

     i9efdy5er4ozf5t

     actually, those are great ways. but unfortunately i am realizing there is apparently a lot more to it

     the phanerozoic eon

     hi

     WORDS

     oh that would explain a lot

     well, the problem is i can't see it

2.18.20  5:42 pm   how does one create music to the level of coolness and neatness as you? blips and blops of musical joy is the level of coolness i want my music to have, and you seem to have made it there. don't worry, that's a compliment i promise

     i suppose it's just like language. the more you hang around it, the better you will get

2.18.20  4:59 pm   How are you so talented!

      by frequently putting my soul up for sale and then cancelling it i am able to manipulate the price quite nicely

     yes

     Do you think this is justified?

     we'll see

2.18.20  4:28 pm   Is the violin violent?

     no

     yes

2.18.20  4:25 pm   wow, i'm so jealous of your normalcy. how can i cultivate normalcy?

     first you'll want to go ahead and put on some pants

2.18.20  4:23 pm   are you ambitious?

     yes

2.18.20  4:20 pm   Can you teach me how to write a song?

     i am trying

     i am not, but i was wondering why you are so mad

     very clean

     it's apparently the only thing i am capable of

     questions

     oh that would explain a lot

2.18.20  12:58 pm   How's the 3D Animation going?

      not feasible, but i suppose i never let that stop me before

2.18.20  12:57 pm   my current favorite moment in music is from your song https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HYwhSn7S0uo taking place from 1:15 to 1:29 especially the second "I can play all day" oh my gosh so beautiful sir I'm going to devote as many nights as it takes to figure out what is going on there and then I'll go on a dream with it. Thank you Bill you are beautiful

     holy cornwall you are very friendly

2.18.20  12:52 pm   I don't remember if this got asked before, but why was there such a long pause between "stuck in a rut" being uploaded to iTunes and your next single being put up? And how did "stuck in a rut" come about anyways? Given it's from all the way back in 2008 I'm curious the events surrounding it. 

     hm .... it seems like most of your information is wrong. 'stuck in a rut' the audio recording was made in 2005. it definitely wasn't put on itunes until at least 2015, because i didn't have the abilitiy to put things on itunes until then. but i hopefully dated it correctly, based on when it was made (2005). as of 2005 and the many years before that, i was fully capable of writing and recording instrumental music, but the whole 'words' part of it was really not figured out yet. 'i'm stuck in a rut' was essentially all i could fathom at that time. although meanwhile i was going absolutely bonkers via text editors. which i recommend to anyone who is trying to figure out which way is which. my strategy in general was to see if i could deconstruct the entire universe and how it works. that was just the only way i could get my head around the full game of songwriting, including any and all musical/linguistical things i thought i could and might be capable of. somewhere around 2009 i think i found myself ready to get into the full songwriting game, but it still took a few more years after that to get the recording schemes, and the writing schemes, further organized. videos, is yet an entirely separate piece of the puzzle which i had to sort of put together from scratch .... which i am actually doing again now, as it turns out

2.18.20  12:40 pm   do you ever get tired of yourself?

     always have been

2.18.20  12:22 pm   What is a train

     it's like a car with wheels

2.18.20  12:04 pm   how do i find life more interesting mr.bill

     strap a pair of binoculars to your head

2.18.20  11:52 am   Isn't it funny that 'o evil you'/'o vile you' are anagrams of 'i love you'? Because the meaning of the sentence gets completely twisted...

     i think it's actually very weird that everyone seems to consider the word 'O' acceptable in anagrams. i have never seen or heard that word used in real life

2.18.20  11:50 am   what's your opinion on wonder bread?

     very good weapon. just think, if world wars 1 and 2 had used wonderbread instead of guns, how different the world would be today

2.18.20  11:49 am   Did you make the 3d model of the guitar yourself or did you just download it from somewhere and paint it? (referring to 'whoa heuifgareiu')

     made it myself based on a photo reference of what i think was an ibanez

2.18.20  11:45 am   Will you be posting more videos in a shorter period of time after posting the next one?

     extremely yes

     What i'm trying to ask is are you making/did you make multiple videos you will be posting regularly, like idk every 2 weeks or so?

     none of them have been made yet, but i think 2 weeks is a very nice interval. 1 week would be better, although maybe i would allow 3 to 4 weeks if it's something a bit longer and more intensive. any longer than that would just not be acceptable to me

2.18.20  11:44 am   How do you feel about the Israel-Palestine Conflict?

     classic

2.18.20  11:38 am   Hi, it's the cut up whisks thing person who was trying to figure out how to play 'I'm crazy/it's raining'...

Is the second chord A E A C#?

     pretty much

     In some countries, B is called H, i forgot it's different in America...

Btw...what's the actual name for what i called cut up whisks?

     brushes

      And could you at least laugh at my unprofessional language or did you just facepalm or sth?

     no

     Also thanks for your last answer!

 

     thank you for your continued gesture of friendliness

2.18.20  11:11 am   why do i enjoy listening to shitty music

     because you can absorb its good qualities

2.18.20  11:09 am   how important is passing high school physics

     i have no idea
